argument.name: srcFilepath
argument.description: Local file URL for the file to be moved.

argument.name: destDirpath
argument.description: The URL of the directory to move the file.

argument.name: destFilename
argument.description: The file name for the moved file. If *[js:null]*, the source filename will be used.

argument.name: onMoveSuccess
argument.description: A javascript function that is called if the file is successfully moved.

argument.name: onError
argument.description: A javascript function that is called if an error occurs when moving the file.
